summary.para: Dynamically sets the output media type of the record sink or preview sink.

param.name: dwStreamIndex
param.para: The stream index to change the output media type on.

param.name: pEncodingAttributes
param.para: The new encoder attributes. This can be null.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

description.para: The sink does not support the media type.

remarks.para: This is an asynchronous call. Listen to the MF_CAPTURE_ENGINE_OUTPUT_MEDIA_TYPE_SET event to be notified when the output media type has been set.

summary.para: Extends the interface to provide functionality for dynamically setting the output media type of the record sink or preview sink.
